remarks: Leibniz' formula can also be expanded by rows.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Jul-2018.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 23-Jul-2019.)
statement:
mdetfval.d $e |- D = ( N maDet R ) $.
mdetfval.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
mdetfval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
mdetfval.p $e |- P = ( Base ` ( SymGrp ` N ) ) $.
mdetfval.y $e |- Y = ( ZRHom ` R ) $.
mdetfval.s $e |- S = ( pmSgn ` N ) $.
mdetfval.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
mdetfval.u $e |- U = ( mulGrp ` R ) $.
mdetleib2 $p |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ M e. B ) -> ( D ` M ) = ( R gsum ( p e. P |-> ( ( ( Y o. S ) ` p ) .x. ( U gsum ( x e. N |-> ( x M ( p ` x ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d .x. p $.
$d B p x $.
$d M p x $.
$d N p x $.
$d P p x $.
$d R p x $.
$d S p $.
$d U p $.
$d Y p $.
